Charleston + Savannah
Menu Home Restaurant Menus Shop Press Locations Contact Home Restaurant Menus Shop Press Locations Contact Book Reservations 
Locations

Charleston, SC

513 King Street

Housed in a lovingly restored storefront on Charleston's bustling King Street, we strive for “instant classic” status. Grab a stool at the 14-seat raw bar, settle into a table full of deliciousness, or perch beside the full-service bar.

HOURS:Open Daily - Sun, 11 AM - Close | Mon-Sat, 4 PM to Close
Map It Book your Charleston, SC reservation on Resy 
Savannah, GA

27 Montgomery Street

Set within a beautifully restored 130-year-old building on Montgomery Street, The Darling Oyster Bar Savannah channels the city’s easy coastal elegance with timeless Lowcountry charm. Pull up a stool at the raw bar, tuck into a cozy booth, or unwind at the bar and stay awhile.

HOURS:Open Daily, 4pm - Close
Map It Book your Savannah, GA reservation on Resy 
Contact Us
CHS: 843.641.0821 SAV: 912.667.7740

Celebrating the bounty of the sea, the rhythm of the seasons, and the joy of savored moments shared daily. Vintage Charleston, SC Raw Oyster Bar.

Reservations

Call CHS: 843.641.0821 SAV: 912.667.7740
Menus Main Brunch Raw Bar Dessert Drinks 
The Restaurants

Occupying distinctive historic spaces in Charleston, SC, and Savannah, GA, both locations showcase timeless Southern charm. Take a seat, enjoy fresh oysters and classic cocktails, and savor the unmistakable spirit of the Lowcountry.
Learn More 
Darling Oyster Bar Catering

Let The Darling Oyster Bar come to you!

We can bring the raw bar to you! Book The Darling for your next oyster roast, Lowcountry boil, party, or corporate event. Email catering@thedarling.com for all of the details.
